price: ឬមួយយើងបានបង្កើតម៉ាឡាអ៊ីកាត់ជាភេទស្រី ដោយ ពួកគេមើលឃើញ(ថាដូច្នោះ)ឬ?
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَٰثٗا وَهُمۡ شَٰهِدُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: am khalaqnā al-malāikata ināthan wahum shāhidūna
